attributes.action: Conduct a study to find out why the British are so complacent about their government destroying their society.
attributes.additional_details: Our way of life is being destroyed by our politicians who prefer to send millions of our pounds to buy new cars for African dictators while cutting basic life support for the most vulnerable in this country.  While this is going on the most trending e-petition is one about the welfare of rabbits - why is it we Brits allow ourselves to be screwed by the few - repeatedly - and spend our time worrying how our rabbits are feeling?
